IntroductionÔÉÅ

The CFSpy Python package is developed to compute numerically the Chen-Fliess series representation of the output of nonlinear input-output control systems. These systems are described by

\[\begin{split}\begin{eqnarray} \dot{z} &=& g_0(z) + \sum_{i = 1}^{m} g_i(z) u_i\\ y &=& h(z) \end{eqnarray}\end{split}\]

where the vector fields \(g_i\) and the output function \(h\) are analytic. The Chen-Fliess series has the form:

\[\begin{eqnarray} F_c[u](t) = \sum_{\eta \in X^*} (c, \eta) E_{\eta}[u](t) \end{eqnarray}\]
